attributes.action: Put retirement back to 60 for working class people
attributes.additional_details: Let the working class who have paid into the system for 30 years retire at 60
attributes.background: Stop the benefit people getting a retirement pension

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653358

If you'd like eligibility for the State Pension to be changed you could start a new petition setting out how you want eligibility to be changed.
